articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Letter of Thanks to Builders of Wonsan Youth Power Station and Their Helpers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Letter of Thanks to Builders of Wonsan Youth Power Station and Their Helpers
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on January 7 sent a letter of thanks to the builders and their helpers for having performed shining labor feats in the construction of the Wonsan Youth Power Station. 
					 He said in the letter of thanks that the power station is a monumental structure of eternal value that sprang up thanks to the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation on this land without fail by dint of the tremendous might of the single-minded unity of Songun Korea where the party, the leader and the people formed an integral whole and with their own strength and technology and resources. 
					
					 The builders of the power station are the pace-setters in displaying the spirit of self-reliance as they created everything from nothing by turning out as one in a persevering struggle in a do-or-die spirit at a time when the country was undergoing a stern trial and the indomitable fighters who proved in practice the great vitality of the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance instilled by President Kim Il Sung into them, the letter noted, and continued:
					
					 The completion of the power station helped lay a solid foundation for successfully solving the problem of electricity and drinking water for the citizens of Wonsan and rapidly developing the economy in the province and remarkably change the landscape of the country. 
					
					 It will instill great strength and courage into all the people of the country now all out in the great advance to bring about a new great revolutionary surge on all fronts of building a powerful nation in hearty response to the militant call of the party and the letter sent by the workers of the Kangson Steel Complex.
					
					 I highly praise all the builders of the Wonsan Youth Power Station and their helpers for having constructed a great structure, a product of the spirit of self-reliance, which will go down long in history along with the Songun era, by displaying the inexhaustible mental power stronger than A-bomb, upholding the party's gigantic plan for nature transformation.
					
					 The officials, party members and all other working people in Kangwon Province including the builders of the station should loudly sound the general advance, holding high the torch for effecting a new great revolutionary surge in the  Songun era kindled by the party in Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement, and thus make a positive contribution to opening  the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 which will mark the centenary of birth of the President and bringing about the fullest development of Songun Korea.  
					
					 All the party organizations and officials in Kangwon Province should dynamically conduct the organizational and political work for steadily heightening the revolutionary enthusiasm of the masses, which had grown exceptionally stronger through the construction of the power station, in order to make the high-pitched drive for self-reliance and great revolutionary surge rage on the land of Kangwon and build more gigantic structures to add shine to the Songun era. 
					
					 It is my firm belief that the builders of the power station and all the party members and other working people in Kangwon Province will bring about uninterrupted miracles and innovations in the general charge to open the gate to a thriving nation, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party, and thus creditably live up to the party's trust and expectation.

articles.title: Wonsan Youth Power Station Commissioned
articles.content:
Wonsan Youth Power Station Commissioned
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The large-scale Wonsan Youth Power Station was commissioned with due ceremony on Saturday.
					 The builders of the station finished on the highest level the overall projects, such as waterway tunneling, dam building, pressure conduit project, assembling of equipment and building of generating room and electric power system, by introducing advanced building methods after working out a rational dam design of Korean style under the difficult conditions that everything was in need.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the orientation and ways for its construction several times and preferentially provided everything needed. Recently he visited again the completed station and gave pep talk to the workers out in the new year's advance movement, expressing great satisfaction at the fact that the builders have successfully constructed the modern power station of historic significance.
					
					 The completion of the station, which was successfully built as a admirable edifice in the era of Songun in the wake of the Anbyon Youth Power Station and Anbyon Youth Power Station No.2, helped completely carry into practice President Kim Il Sung's last instructions on establishing a competent hydro-power base in Kangwon Province and Kim Jong Il's far-reaching plan for providing the people with happier life.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Premier Kim Yong Il, Department Director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee Pak Nam Gi, Chairman of the State Planning Commission Kim Kwang Rin and officials concerned and officials, builders and working people of Kangwon Province.
					
					 There a letter of thanks from Kim Jong Il was conveyed to the builders and volunteers who performed the shining labor feats in the construction of the power station.
					
					 Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, made an unveiling address which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers stressed the need to brilliantly adorn a-hundred-year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea shining with the Juche era with the great victory of Korean-style socialism and expressed the determination to proudly complete the Wonsan Army-People Power Station and bring about a new turn in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation by giving full play to their infinite mental power again.

articles.title: First Friday Labor Done by Public Servants
articles.content:
First Friday Labor Done by Public Servants
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Public servants of ministries and national institutions of the DPRK did the first Friday labor this year on fields of farms on Jan. 9.
					 Officials of ministries and national institutions went to the Mangyongdae and Chilgol farms in Mangyongdae District and the Jangchon Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang City, spent a worthwhile day by helping agricultural workers in making preparations for this year's farming.
					
					 The participants delivered a lot of small farm implements sincerely prepared by them and compost to the farms.
					
					 There was an exhibition of small farm implements at the Kim Il Sung Square on the same day. They were manufactured by ministries and national institutions by tapping latent reserves to implement the tasks for strengthening the material and technological assistance to the countryside laid down in the joint New Year editorial. 
					
					Meanwhile, officials in each province, city and county also participated in the Friday labor. It included transporting scrap iron to metallurgical works, improving railroad beds and carrying compost to farms.

articles.title: New Posters Released
articles.content:
New Posters Released
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House and the Korean Central Fine Arts Studio produced several posters encouraging the army and the people to a new revolutionary surge. 
					 Posters "Bring about a new revolutionary surge on all fronts in the same stamina as displayed in Kangson!", "Turn out to implement the tasks laid down in the joint editorial for this year!" and "Demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea on the mental strength of the army and the people!" represent the working class holding high the torch of the great upswing in the Songun era and the proud army and people who have turned out as one in the general offensive. 
					
					The posters vividly reflect the firm faith and determination of the army and people of the DPRK to bring about a historic upswing on all fronts building a great prosperous powerful nation under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KCNA on Euro Challenging Old Financial Order Dominated by U.S. Dollar
articles.content:
KCNA on Euro Challenging Old Financial Order Dominated by U.S. Dollar
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Ten years have passed since the euro came into being on Jan. 1, 1999.
					 Since then the euro has steadily bolstered its status challenging the old international financial order dominated by the U.S. dollar. 
					
					Euro zone has gained in scope and the use of the euro is on the steady increase in the international financial transaction, gradually pushing aside the U.S. dollar. 
					
					 Eleven countries were the first to introduce the euro.  Among them were France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the Netherlands. This January Slovakia joined those countries, bringing the number of the euro-using countries to 16. The euro zone currently has a combined population of 320 million, compared with the U.S. with a population of about 302 million. 
					
					 According to an opinion poll conducted in 2005 among central banks in 65 countries of the world, two thirds of them had already begun changing the U.S. dollar into the euro out of their foreign currency reserves.
					
					 At a time when the euro made its appearance, more than 65 percent of the world trading was settled with the U.S. dollar. But it was reduced to about 50 percent at present and the remaining proportion of trade was done with the euro or other currencies.
					
					 The U.S. sanctions against developing countries taking the road of independence against imperialism resulted in raising the status of the euro in the international financial and trade markets.
					
					 In October 2004 the Cuban Central Bank banned the use of the U.S. dollar in commercial dealings and decided to use the euro and other currencies instead.
					
					 The Syrian government clarified in February 2007 that it changed the U.S. dollar amounting to half of the country's foreign currency reserves into the euro.
					
					 In April last year the Iranian government stated that it completely stopped using the U.S. dollar in the nation's oil dealings with other countries.
					
					 The U.S. dollar is on an unprecedented decline and the euro has instead become relatively stable and strong against the backdrop of its increased status and role in the international financial and trading markets.
					
					 In the period from 2002 to 2005 the U.S. dollar exchange rate declined 38 percent as against the euro and, in the subsequent period, it went down more than 20 percent. That of the euro set the record of $ 1.56 in March last year. Even though it experienced a slight decline due to the worldwide financial crunch, it still remains relatively stable.
					
					 Experts remark that had it not been for the euro the European countries would have suffered a bigger loss due to the worldwide financial meltdown and that the crisis has made the euro even more attractive. No wonder, Britain and other EU countries which did not introduce the euro were particularly hard hit by the crisis.
					
					 This has prompted Britain, Denmark, Switzerland and other EU countries which have long stayed out of the euro zone to have a second thought about the introduction of the euro.
					
					 According to IMF, the euro represented 8.5 percent increase in the worldwide foreign reserves during the period from 1999 to 2007 while the U.S. dollar shrank 8 percent. A particular mention should be made of the fact that in the three-month period till September 2007 when the financial crisis occurred in the U.S. the euro registered 0.9 percent increase while the U.S. dollar showed 1.2 percent decrease.
					
					 This indicates that the worldwide financial crisis marked a fresh occasion of bolstering the euro's status as compared with the U.S. dollar.
					
					 EU member nations are openly challenging the U.S., claiming that "Bretton Woods" system has served its time.
					
					 There are brisk moves worldwide including Latin America and Africa to counter the U.S. dollar with regional uniform currency, stimulated by the rise of the euro's status.  Observers predict that this will give further momentum to the efforts to build a multi-polar world.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Work Hard for National Reconciliation and Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Work Hard for National Reconciliation and Unity
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- It is the principled stand consistently maintained by the Workers' Party of Korea to reunify the country through national reconciliation and unity, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a priority task and a more important requirement for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country at present to realize national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 National reconciliation and unity do not come of themselves. This depends on how the Koreans make redoubled efforts to achieve reconciliation and unity, regarding them as their common goals. 
					
					 The Korean nation's cause of national reunification is facing a grave challenge due to the moves of the conservative ruling forces in south Korea.
					
					 The reality requires all the compatriots aspiring after the reunification of the country to turn out as one in the patriotic struggle to achieve national reconciliation and unity by meeting the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Whoever truly wants the country's reunification and loves the nation should swim with the trend of the times towards the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and carry out the duty and role as a member of the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans should successfully adorn this year as a successful year in the patriotic struggle to accelerate the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of national reconciliation and unity, concludes the article.

articles.title: Security Authorities' Crackdown upon S. Korean Progressive Body under Fire
articles.content:
Security Authorities' Crackdown upon S. Korean Progressive Body under Fire
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee for foiling the case cooked up against the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement titled "We will more resolutely struggle against the suppression under the pretext of security" on Jan. 6.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the solidarity branded the suppression of the security authorities as a "retaliation against candlelight actions", a "plot to scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" and "case fabricated to tide over the ruling crisis," formed an emergency measure committee and has since staged a sit-in strike, called press conferences and conducted a hunger strike and a court struggle, etc. 
					
					 The statement accused the security authorities of having resorted to such sinister moves as misinterpreting the time to form the above-said body in a bid to arrest the activities of the solidarity by invoking the "National Security Law" and branding even its participation in the legal event for the south-north non-governmental exchange as a violation of "the NSL provision on entry and meeting" and "contact." 
					
					 The security authorities are working hard to escalate the moves for fabricating the case to label the above-said body an "enemy-benefiting organization" as the truth behind the illegal investigation conducted by the security authorities has become gradually clear. 
					
					 Terming the plot of the security authorities to hype the above-said case an artifice to justify the moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime for confrontation with fellow countrymen and its dictatorial policy, the statement declared the solidarity would wage a more dynamic struggle to foil the plot of Lee and the security authorities to disorganize and destroy the above-said body.

articles.title: Conservative Media's False Propaganda Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservative Media's False Propaganda Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy and Media Action called a press conference in front of the Chosun Ilbo on Jan. 6 to denounce conservative media for conducting false propaganda to support the puppet authorities' moves to railroad evil bills through the "National Assembly."
					 At the conference speakers accused such conservative media as the Chosun Ilbo, the Choongang Ilbo and the Dong-A Ilbo of giving wide publicity to the misinformation provided by the conservative forces to railroad "Lee Myung Bak's evil bills" through the NA.
					
					 They recalled the fact that the conservative media, which described the general strike staged by the Press Trade Union as "collective egoism" and the like, are now working hard to take over broadcasting services in return for concealing their management sides' histories of pro-Japanese acts and taking the lead in the campaign to help Lee win the "presidential election."
					
					 The people's resentment not only against the Lee regime and the "Grand National Party" but against the conservative media serving them is running high, they said, warning that the people would punish the above-said three media without fail, unless they come to their senses.
					
					 A press release read out at the conference accused the three conservative media of releasing only false reports over the issue of enacting unpopular evil laws including the "law on assembly and demonstration" and "cyber contempt."
					
					 Their wild dream to put broadcasting services under their control will never come true, it stressed.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Flailed
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting to vow to punish the Lee Myung Bak regime in Seoul on Jan. 7 with at least 2,000 members of its organizations and members of political parties and civic and public organizations attending.
					 At the meeting speakers recalled that the discussion of the Lee regime's plan to railroad undemocratic evil bills aimed to violate democracy and deteriorate the people's living through the "National Assembly" has been put off thanks to the stubborn struggles of people from all walks of life including the general strike staged by the Press Trade Union.
					
					 But nobody knows when the Lee regime would ram the evil bills through the NA again, they warned, calling upon all of them to turn out in the struggle to check it.
					
					 They accused Lee Myung Bak of contemplating passing the bill calling for retrogressively revising the "law on part-time job" and the "law on minimum wage" through the "extraordinary session of the NA" in February in a bid to bring pain to the workers.
					
					 They declared that the organizations would carry on their indomitable struggle till the Lee regime kneels down before the people.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, Secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India Palam Sen Gupta who is general secretary of the All-India Peace and Solidarity Organization and Chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Riyad Chaloub separately released statements in support of the DPRK's joint New Year editorial.
					 The Russian organization in its statement on Jan. 3 said that the editorial is not a simple document indicating the DPRK's orientation of development for this year but a strong appeal calling on all the Korean people to give full play to their persevering will.
					
					 The agreements already reached between the north and the south are facing grave challenges owing to the reckless moves of the south Korean ruling forces but nothing can block the advance of the times towards independent reunification, it stressed.
					
					 Palam Sen Gupta in his statement on Jan. 6 extended solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle under the idea of "By our nation itself" to foil the maneuvers of the anti-reunification forces running counter to the trend of the times towards independent reunification, steeped in sycophancy towards the U.S. and hostility towards fellow countrymen, and expressed his belief that the Korean people would surely achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification in the near future under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Riyad Chaloub in his statement on Jan. 3 said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's experienced and seasoned leadership was the main source of Songun Korea's all victories and miracles and his ideas and theories served as a great banner for giving the fullest display to the spiritual strength of the army and people.
					
					 The Korean people are sure to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in the near future under the uplifted banner of the great Juche idea, the banner of Songun, he noted.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures were sponsored by the Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany and the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and a film show and a book and photo exhibition took place in India, a film show in Thailand and roundtable talks were given by the Secretariat of the  Pan-African Movement between Dec. 19 and 23 last year to observe the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairperson of the Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany said that Kim Jong Il has trained the KPA into the ranks of the firm faith to uphold the leadership of the party and leader and into an invincible army strong in the sense of organization and discipline which formed a harmonious whole with the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo introduced in detail Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk's brilliant revolutionary life.
					
					 The director of an international trading company of Thailand praised Kim Jong Il as a genuine popular leader who has devotedly worked for the people.
					
					 The acting director for Political Affairs and International Relations of the Pan-African Movement said that by holding Kim Jong Il at the post of the supreme commander of the KPA the Korean people became able to courageously shatter the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and dynamically advance the cause of justice chosen by them to victory.

articles.title: Entidad y personalidades extranjeras apoyan editorial conjunto de Corea
articles.content:
Entidad y personalidades extranjeras apoyan editorial conjunto de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de la Idea Juche de la Juventud de Rusia, el secretario del Consejo Nacional del Partido Comunista de la India y secretario general de la Organizacion Panindia de la Paz y Solidaridad, Palam Sen Gupta, y el presidente del Comite Nacional Guineo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, Riyad Chaloub, publicaron sendas declaraciones en apoyo al editorial conjunto del ano nuevo de Corea.
					La declaracion fechada 3 de la entidad rusa senala que el editorial conjunto no es solo un simple documento que define la orientacion de desarrollo de Corea de este ano sino una fuerte proclama que hace brillar el espiritu perseverante de todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					Subraya que debido a las imprudentes maquinaciones de las fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea, tropiezan con un serio desafio los acuerdos logrados por ambas partes de Corea, pero, con nada puede impedir la tendencia de la epoca a la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Palam Sen Gupta, en su declaracion oral del dia 6, envio la solidaridad con la justa lucha que libra el pueblo coreano con el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" para frustrar las maquinaciones de las fuerzas que presas de la idea servil a EE.UU. y la conciencia de hostilidad al Norte marchan a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca de la reunificacion independiente y expreso conviccion de que bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea el pueblo coreano lograria sin falta en un futuro cercano la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					
					Riyad Chaloub, en su declaracion oral fechada 3 senalo que la veterana y probada direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il sirvio de fuente principal de todas las victorias y milagros de Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar), y su idea y teoria fueron la gran bandera estimulante que puso de pleno manifiesto la potencia espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					El pueblo coreano abrira de par en par sin falta en unos anos proximos las puertas a la gran potencia prospera enarbolando la bandera de la gran idea Juche y la del Songun, enfatizo el.

articles.title: Entidades surcoreanas critican a los conservadores medios de prensa
articles.content:
Entidades surcoreanas critican a los conservadores medios de prensa
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- El Consejo Popular por el Bienestar Publico y Democracia, la "Accion Media" y otras entidades civiles y sociales del Sur de Corea concedieron el dia 6 una rueda de prensa frente a la editorial de "Chosun Ilbo" criticando la locura de los medios de prensa conservadores en cuanto a las maniobras de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas encaminadas a aprobar por la fuerza unas leyes infames.
					  En la ocasion los oradores revelaron que los periodicos conservadores "Chosun Ilbo", "Choongang Ilbo" y "Dong-a Ilbo" informan ampliamente las opiniones tergiversadas de las fuerzas conservadoras que tratan de aprobar por la fuerza las "leyes infames de MB (siglas de Lee Myung Bak)".
					
					  Estos medios, que describieron la huelga general de la "Federacion Nacional de Sindicatos de la Prensa" como el "egoismo colectivo", etc., intentan encubrir ahora el expediente de crimenes projaponeses de si mismos y recibir las radioemisoras a cambio de haber jugado el papel de vanguardia en la campana para convertir a Lee en el "presidente", denunciaron.
					
					  Senalando que crece la indignacion del pueblo por el "poder" de Lee, el "Gran Partido Nacional" y esos periodicos adulones a los primeros, advirtieron que "estos medios seran juzgados sin falta por el pueblo si siguen actuando irrazonablemente como ahora".
					
					  La nota de entrevista leida en la ocasion apunta que dichos rotativos se dedican unicamente a la demagogia en cuanto a la institucion de leyes infames antidemocraticas incluyendo la "ley sobre el mitin y manifestacion" y el "crimen de humillacion por via cibernetica".
					
					Prosigue que es irrealizable la ilusion de esos medios de apoderarse de las radioemisoras.

articles.title: CSS condena al "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CSS condena al "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- La Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS) auspicio el dia 7 en Seul el acto de juramento para enjuiciar al "poder" de Lee Myung Bak en que estuvieron presentes mas de 2 mil gremiales de los sindicatos adscritos a la CSS y miembros de los partidos politicos y las entidades civiles y sociales.
					  En la ocasion los oradores se refirieron a que el "poder" de Lee se vio obligado a posponer la aprobacion en la "Asamblea Nacional" de las infames leyes contra la democracia y la vida del pueblo ante la lucha rotunda desatada en distintos sectores incluyendo la huelga general de la Federacion Nacional de Sindicatos de la Prensa.
					
					  Pero, nadie sabe cuando el "poder" de Lee volvera a tratar de aprobarlas fraudulentamente,  advirtieron y llamaron a todos a lanzarse a la lucha por detenerlo.
					
					  Condenaron que Lee intenta aprobar en la "sesion extraordinaria de la Asamblea Nacional" prevista para febrero el proyecto de peor enmienda de la "ley de subempleados" y de la "ley de salario minimo" para imponer sufrimientos a los obreros.
					
					  Expresaron la determinacion de luchar sin retroceso hasta el dia en que el "poder" de Lee se rinda de rodillas ante el pueblo surcoreano.

articles.title: Carteles estimulantes al nuevo y gran auge revolucionario
articles.content:
Carteles estimulantes al nuevo y gran auge revolucionario
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- La Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes dieron a publicidad varios carteles que estimulan a todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a producir el nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					  Los afiches "!Vamos a producir un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario en todos los frentes con el coraje de Kangson!", "!A cumplir las tareas presentadas en el editorial conjunto del ano nuevo!" y "!A exaltar la dignidad y la potencia de la Corea del Songun con la potencia espiritual de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo!" describen bien los aspectos de la clase obrera que ha levantado en alto la antorcha del gran auge revolucionario en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) y del ejercito y el pueblo enfrascados por unanimidad en la ofensiva general. 
					
					Tambien reflejan vividamente la ferrea fe e invencible impetu del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de registrar saltos historicos en todos los frentes de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del Songun del General Kim Jong Il.
